post_text:
Sage Wall, Montana found in 1996

The official narrative by the goverment says that it’s ”natural geological formations”.

It’s interesting how they lie, manipulate and twist everything out of reality. The truth is there just open your eyes. https://t.co/bFhNHkKKFz

structured_response.image_description: The image shows a large stone wall with a person standing in front of it, pointing towards the wall. The wall appears to be made of large, rectangular stones, some of which are weathered and have moss or lichen growing on them. The setting is outdoors, with a forested area in the background and a grassy, slightly barren ground in the foreground. The person is wearing a backpack and a wide-brimmed hat, suggesting they are exploring or observing the site.

The lighting, shadows, and details in the stones and surrounding environment are consistent with natural conditions.
